publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5039 Mr Tom McCabe: The Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2006—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-5039 Mr Tom McCabe: The Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2006—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
